originalText.text: Best fun I had in a long time! took my best friend of 20+ yrs out on the town for her bridal shower after party! We had a blast! I almost did not purchase the tickets based on the bad reviews,  I read , I am so glad I changed my mind,  It was the highlight of the night. even the pre-show was awesome and funny. I dnt want to give too much details away, but I do recommend the show, the guys are handsome and sweet. the cost is a little on the pricey side but its worth it, men everywhere, I turn left men, look right more men, I felt a bump on my chair from behind another one,  $67 to sit with the 2 drink min. $20 each lap dance. I also paid the $50 for the hot seat special for my friend, lets just say smiled all they way home.

originalText.text: me and my girls were visiting nyc and were looking for something different to do... this was definitely it.  i read some of the positive reviews here and decided to book some tickets to a male strip show.  i had never been and had no idea what to expect.  needless to say i was very impressed.... the guys were all hot and the dancing was phenomenal.  plus i loved how they brought girls up on stage and did all these funny things to them.  great job guys1!!

originalText.text: I would like to write a 5 star review for the wonderful customer service I received over the phone while inquiring and booking a bachelorette package. I called into the reservation line to book a bachelorette party for my friend and I was lucky enough to be served by the wonderful, Alex Perri. Not only was Alex informative, he was exceptionally patient, fun to talk to and courteous. We are a group of 10 Canadian girls who have never seen a male strip show before and aren't familiar with the NYC scene. Alex took the time to explain the different price options, the perks of VIP, line bypass, and the dynamics of the hotseat. He definitely convinced me to get the full VIP package and a hotseat for the bride-to-be on her last fling-before-the-ring! Right from that phone call, my first experience with Hunkomania was off to a good start and we are so excited to come live in person for the ultimate show! I'll provide an updated post for the actual experience as I'm sure it will be loads of fun but bottom line, I think Alex Perri should deserve a solid Kudos and bonus for his exceptional service!

originalText.text: Hunk-o-mania? More like hassle-mania! Lots of hidden fees: Mandatory fee of $22 for 2 drinks, mandatory coat check fee $4, Lap dance costs $20 . Really bad service- The women up front who told us about the $22 were yelling at us and really rude. Drinks were bad and some guys were really pushy (Asian guy). There were some attractive guys though. Do not recommend.

originalText.text: I had the best time here with the hot male strippers of Hunkomania.  Last year I went to Harrah's pool party.  This year I decided to go to a male strip show with 9 of my girls.  I made the right decision in picking this one.  I read the positive reviews online and booked a table.  Once we got there we had champagne and erotic cakes lol... Plus we had hunky waiters deliver us drinks.  The show itself was amazing!!! The guys had all these different costumes and they came out and danced on a big stage.  I was laughing so hard my sides hurt loll.... I definitely would recommend this to anybody looking to do something different for their birthday party (girls of course lol, the boys already have their own strip show)\
